lemma fixes a::complex\<comment>\<open>TODO: generalize\<close> assumes a: "0 < Re a" shows integrable_on_cexp_minus_to_infinity: "(\<lambda>x. exp (x *\<^sub>R - a)) integrable_on {c..}" and integral_cexp_minus_to_infinity: "integral {c..} (\<lambda>x. exp (x *\<^sub>R - a)) = exp (c *\<^sub>R - a) / a"
